value:
$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|This Hoshidan kimono is lovely, but
it just doesn't seem...quite my style.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|I can't say I'm surprised you feel that
way, Camilla.$k$pThough, I am surprised you chose to
accompany me on my first shrine visit
of the new year.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|It's called "hatsumode," right? And of
course I'm glad to go with you, Azura!
We are sisters, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Thank you, Camilla. It makes me
happy to hear you say that.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|And since we're in Hoshido, my dear
little sister... Heehee, feel free to call
me "oneesan" for the day!$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Um... Are you...sure?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|Absolutely! There's no reason to be
embarrassed. Like I said, we're
sisters.$k$pOh, but maybe "oneechan" would be
better...?$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Well... Let me think it over...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|I think we need to fall back. Stay
close, Azura.$k$p$WmMPID_年明けアクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_NewYear18,Face|Of course, Camilla...$k$pUm... Oneesan...$k$p$WmMPID_年明けカミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_NewYear18,Face|Heehee. We'll get along as sisters
just splendidly, I'm sure.$k$p$Sbs150|
